descriptionHtml:
I try to make a personal taste to replace crossbow idles,if most people enjoy it,i may try to make a full version and including the sneak draw.

The runing idle is very well for personal feeling,but walk and turning idle may not fit for your taste,if you dont want to use the walk or turn idle,plz removed crossbow_walkforward.hkx trun 60/180.hkx from path meshes\\\\actors\\\\character\\\\animations\\\\dlc01\\\\

Skyrim cloak swing supports.

Preview video provide by Septfox 
[youtube]fRGV_gHubVQ[/youtube] 
[youtube]56R1k8bf_8w[/youtube]
[youtube]tAzLz_NveGc[/youtube]
changelog:
1.05.01
Add missing sneak idle for match with crossbow default style.
1.05
Default style released with sneak draw idle.
For some reason the crossbow sneak draw is not match with custom crossbow standing idle,the only one solution is using the vanilla idle to adjust for match the sneak draw,even it seems like vanilla idle,but after my adjust it\'s no loop any more.

I set this to default style,if you want to use sneak draw,plz download this one,the sneak draw/aim/release/reload idle is including inside.again,dont try to use the sneak draw idle with other crossbow standing style.
1.04
Lady style adjust equip idle,adjust standing body balance, now seems is much better,i am try to making a new walk for lady style,it may take a long time and i m not sure i can finish or not,so i choice upload other adjust first.
1.03
Lady style add walkforward/run/turn/sprint.
1.02a
Lady style reupload,the frist one is not finish.I just type wrong file to upload.
1.02
Lady style released,not yet including walk/run/turn idles,add soon... 
1.01
Add better sprintforward and walkforward.
